briefTitle: The GUARD Trial - Part 1: A Phase 3 Clinical Trial for Prevention of Proliferative Vitreoretinopathy
officialTitle: The GUARD Trial - Part 1: A Phase 3 Clinical Trial of Repeated Intravitreal Injections of ADX-2191 Versus Standard-of-Care for Prevention of Proliferative Vitreoretinopathy
summary: The GUARD Trial is a multi-center, randomized, controlled, adaptive Phase 3 clinical trial of repeated intravitreal injections of ADX-2191 versus standard-of-care for the prevention of proliferative vitreoretinopathy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Recurrent Retinal Detachment Compared to Historical Rates
